steps: Simmer ['ing']{Heavy cream}, ['ing']{Granulated sugar}, and ['ing']{Vanilla extract} until sugar dissolves.
Whisk ['ing']{Medium egg yolks} in a bowl. Slowly temper with hot cream (1 cup at a time).
Stir in the ['ing']{Chocolate chips}: let sit 5 mins, then whisk until smooth.
Fill a roasting pan with hot water halfway up ramekins.
Bake 40-50 mins until edges set but center wobbles slightly.
Sprinkle ['ing']{Caster sugar} evenly over each ramekin. Broil 1-3 mins or torch until golden. Serve immediately.
